attributes.action: Uplift the emphasis on PREVENTION in combination with awareness, intervention, treatment and rehabilitation so that PREVENTION is the key strategy with regard to drug abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National policy suggests that tackling drug abuse requires a multiple facited approach.  We agree with this, however see that insufficient emphasis is placed on effective prevention activity.  We do not wish to see any reduction to support for treatment and intervention.  We wish to see that prevention is given a fighting chance as part of a co-ordinated approach.
